questions.tagline: Welcome to our demo interactive question thingy!
questions.title: First question from the flowchart

options.label: Would you like to explore a particular subject area?
Are you interested in accessing, publishing or managing digital objects?
Are you interested in guidance and educational material?
Find databases according to what's most important to you
Find databases that allow you to access the data you're looking for

options.value: Learn about preparing a data management plan or policy
